players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote her out now to protect the town."
Charlie: "Alice's silence is suspicious, but Bob might be trying to deflect. We need more clues before voting her out."
Charlie: "Alice's silence doesn't help her case, but accusing without proof could backfire. Let's watch her closely and gather more info before voting."
Bob: "Alice was confirmed as the mafioso by my investigation. We can't afford to waste time doubting this. Voting her out now is the only way to keep the town safe."
